trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the **RowUpdating** event of a .NET Framework data provider.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 **RowUpdating** .NET Framework 데이터 공급자의 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The `RowUpdating` event is typically raised just before an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row begins.
trans-unit.target: `RowUpdating` 이벤트는 일반적으로 바로 전에 발생 한 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>행을 시작 합니다.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> is called.
The type of SQL statement to execute.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> object for an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> 이 클래스의 인스턴스에 대 한 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method allows implementations to perform type checking for the <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object assignment.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하면 형식에 대 한 검사를 수행 하는 구현에서 <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>개체 할당.</xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: Only valid <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> objects, for example a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object, should be permitted.
The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> operation.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"> </xref> 하는 동안 실행 하는 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>작업.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
Gets any errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> executes.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 데이터 공급자에 의해 생성 된 모든 오류를 가져옵니다는 경우는 <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>실행.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: The errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> executes.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 데이터 공급자에서 발생 한 오류 때는 <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>실행.</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> that will be sent to the server as part of an insert, update, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> 삽입, 업데이트 또는 삭제 작업의 일환으로 서버에 보내집니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to send through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
Gets the type of SQL statement to execute.
StatementType can be one of the following values: - Select - Insert - Update - Delete
trans-unit.target: StatementType 다음 값 중 하나일 수 있습니다.-선택-삽입 / 업데이트-삭제

trans-unit.source: The type of SQL statement to execute.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> of the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> property.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> values.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Continue" name="Continue" href=""></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
